flawed_nl_solution:
8 years ago James had 20-8=<<20-8=17>>17 years
So 8 years ago John had 17*2=34 years experience
That means John has 34+8=<<34+8=42>>42 years experience
So Mike has 42-16=<<42-16=26>>26 years of experience
So together they have 20+42+26=<<20+42+26=88>>88 years experience
#### 88

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 17. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
